name: Warlord
description: A master of warfare and battlefield tactics, inspiring allies to victory

skills.name: Battlefield Prowess
skills.description: When you make an attack roll against a creature, you do so with 1 boon if at least one of your allies is within 2 yards of the target.

skills.name: Tactical Command
skills.description: You can use an action to choose up to three allies within medium range. Until the end of the round, when a chosen ally uses an action or a triggered action to attack, it makes the attack roll with 1 boon. Once you use this talent, you cannot use it again until after you complete a rest.

skills.name: Strategic Mind
skills.description: You can use Tactical Command twice between each rest. In addition, allies affected by Tactical Command deal 1d6 extra damage on successful attacks.

skills.name: Stand Against the Horde
skills.description: When a creature attacks you, you can use a triggered action to make one attack against it. If the attack hits, the triggering attack has no effect on you.
